dt-event.name: order
dt-event.summary: order event - fired when the data contained in the table is ordered.

type.parameter: Array of objects describing currently applied order

dt-event.description:
The `-event order` event is fired whenever the data in the table is ordered. This is typically triggered by the end user ordering a column, but can also be initiated through the `-api order()` method and when a full redraw (by calling the `-api draw()`) occurs.
Note that the `-event order` will be fired before the table has been redrawn with the updated data, although the data will internally have been ordered.
Please note that, as with all DataTables emitted events, the event object has a DataTables API instance available on it in the `dt` property.
